armorHud.configScreen.title: Slotted Armor HUD mod config
armorHud.configScreen.setting.side.name: Side
armorHud.configScreen.setting.style.name: Style
armorHud.configScreen.setting.orientatio:
Orientation of the widget.
 Horizontal
 Vertical
armorHud.configScreen.setting.anchor.des:
Place that the widget is attached to.
Works in conjunction with 'Side'.
 Top
 Bottom
 Hotbar 
 Top_Center
armorHud.configScreen.setting.side.descr:
Side that the widget is displayed on.
Works in conjunction with 'Anchor'.
 Left
 Right
armorHud.configScreen.setting.offhandSlo:
Defines how the widget reacts to the 
offhand slot and the attack indicator.
 Leave_Space
 Adhere
 Ignore
armorHud.configScreen.setting.offsetX.de: Offsets the widget along the horizontal axis.
armorHud.configScreen.setting.offsetY.de: Offsets the widget along the vertical axis.
armorHud.configScreen.setting.slotsShown:
Defines when and which armor slots are shown.
 Always
 All
 Equipped
armorHud.configScreen.setting.emptyIcons: Displays an armor outline in empty slots.
armorHud.configScreen.setting.reversed.d: Reverses the order of items shown in the widget.
armorHud.configScreen.setting.pushStatus: Pushes status effect icons below the widget.
armorHud.configScreen.setting.warningSho:
Displays a warning icon beside the 
low-durability item.
armorHud.configScreen.setting.minDurabil:
If an item's durability falls below this value, 
a warning icon will be displayed.

If an item's durability falls below this percentage, 
a warning icon will be displayed.
armorHud.configScreen.setting.warningIco:
Defines how quickly the warning icons 
will move up and down.
armorHud.configScreen.setting.style.desc:
Defines how the widget border is drawn.
Resource packs work best with 'Squared Corners'.
 Squared_Corners
 Rounded_Corners
 Rounded_Slots
